title: US Sensation Magnus Sheffield Renews with Ineos Grenadiers through 2026
content:
'Anything I set my mind to is possible': The sky's the limit for 21-year-old talent, and the Brit crew wants in on the journey.

Read the full article at US Sensation Magnus Sheffield Renews with Ineos Grenadiers through 2026 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
